website_summaries.verdict: A useful stocking stuffer for men and women because almost everyone develops dry, chapped hands in the winter.
pros: A variety of hand creams that are perfect to use for skin affected by cold weather
Made by a popular brand in natural products
Scents are pleasant but not "perfumey," so men can use them too
cons: Not practical for individuals who don't need or like to use creams or lotions

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. See soda can for size reference
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller size then I thought it would be. Nice product. See soda can for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: These showed up in a generic envelope, without safety seals, and none of the containers (except the small jar) have the correct weight/amount of contents. The tubes are less than half full. The small jar says .25 ounces, and the tubes labeled .75 ounces have no more contents than the jar does. Not sure what's going on here, but this is a total waste of money. I wouldn't (and do not) trust the contents, and would never give this to a friend or loved one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeron

customer_reviews.title: Gotta be a miracle in a tube!!
customer_reviews.text: At almost 60 years old I got cracked fingers for the first time ever- first one thumb, and about four weeks later the other. I tried everything I could think of- triple antibiotic ointment, tea tree oil, tamanu oil, jojoba oil. Nothing worked. While browsing Amazon one day I ran across this Hand Repair Set from Burt's Bees. From the very first night I'd applied it my thumbs felt better. Within a couple days the pain was gone, and within a week they were healed completely. I don't know what's in this stuff, but I'm a believer: for cracked fingers it's GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE POSSIBLY FALSE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I doubt this was manufactured by Burt's Bees Company---we ordered from Amazon and the packaging was in french. The towelettes caused skin to peel and burn. The other pieces in the set were not as advertised and produced some adverse reactions. This should be reported to the Cosmetic consumer section of the FDA! DO NOT ORDER THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Book Editor

customer_reviews.title: Good products, misleading packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love their products, BUT, this particular package contains misleading packaging. When you take the tubes out, they feel way lighter than you would expect given the size. Holding them up to the light, 2 out of 3 of them were maybe 1/2 full. The seals were still on them so I know it wasn't used, but it's either bad quality control, or deliberate design to make the consumer think they're getting more. I lean towards the latter. I wouldn't order this again, but just buy individually.
customer_reviews.author: MarieK

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 4 boxes as gifts and one of boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 boxes as gifts and one of boxes was totally opened and impossible to close back. How am I supposed to give an open box as a gift? I can't even posh back in the product for some reason. I am supposed to give them out the day after tomorrow and now I have to go out and shop for one more box in person. Such a disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jee Y.

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely amazing. I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. I love everything about it. the healing cream and the gloves gives your day a soft feelings and it would be so noticeable when someone touches or shakes my hand. the gloves does not seem like something that will last forever haven't broken thus far TBH. The cream is not vegan and has milk, which is something I didn't notice myself until after I used it. I saw the picture of the cow, but did not really thing about it. It is not tested on animals though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order received
customer_reviews.text: I like Burt's Bees products. I'm sure this woman's gift set is nice. My wife was just very disappointed on Christmas Day opening the package and finding the men's gift set. She does not really need shave cream and aftershave... I see past reviews indicating the same error in order fulfillment. Looks like you guys need to get your act together.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Check the tubes if they're sealed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't mind that they came in a paper bag since I was planning to gift it with a toiletry pouch, but upon checking the items, one tube has no foil seal and the small glass container doesn't have a seal too, kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Allen

customer_reviews.title: So I am satisfied with this set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set, for snowy climate on vacation. The hand lotion feels a little sticky, and the foot lotion is very thick and gel-like. Nevertheless, all of the products kept my skin from cracking and drying out, and that's the main goal! So I am satisfied with this set. I'm still using the Pom chapstick, in hot weather! It adds some color, and it does help lips from drying out. I enjoy using it. *Interesting tip: If you usually suffer from chapped nose during severe colds, use the B.B. plain chapstick (no added color) around your nostrils after blowing your nose. It will keep them from cracking and blistering. This has been very helpful for me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer101

customer_reviews.title: Sort of beat up box, but okay contents!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not actually using this, but bought it for a white elephant. I’m a little upset because even though it was packaged well whoever had packaged or handled it prior kind of messed up the box. Which makes it a not very nice gift to give. The inside contents look like they haven’t been moved and used though so I think it’s just from products being shuffled around or something. Other than that I gave it 4 stars because I really like this brand for its moisturizing. Just wish the box was a bit more taken care of since I got it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor I.

customer_reviews.title: I think the cuticle cream smells good as well as the almond and milk hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I paid $12.68 for this product. I thought that it was a reasonable price for what you get. I think the cuticle cream smells good as well as the almond and milk hand cream. The only thing that doesn't smell good is the shea butter repair cream. So I would advice starting with that and ending with the better smelling products. It was a little self care gift for myself and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: katherinerose

customer_reviews.title: Scratched tin and not enough packing material inside of the gift tin
customer_reviews.text: I too, like someone else who sent in a picture, had a scratch running down the middle of the gift tin! And there was insufficient packing material inside for the items. Burts bees have really good products, and this is a gift for a friend of mine who lives in England. I am not returning this, but I probably should. I expect much nicer presentation from Burts bees and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bea

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for a co worker that loves Burt's bees product but did not feel comfortable giving her items without the
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before ordering this set. I bought this as a gift for a co worker that loves Burt's bees product but did not feel comfortable giving her items without the safety seals. I would not describe this as a gift set as they all come loose in a large manila mailer. Was also disappointed that two of the items were missing their safety seals and seemed to also be missing some of the product. I tossed the 2 open items and kept the other for myself. At $2.50 per item is not a bad price but not as good a deal as it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: E L

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set, all the products were top quality as always with burts bees. My only complaint is that i bought the gift box with the thought that it would be organized and set like the photo. But as i was wrapping it i heard all of the contents banging around and opened it to realize that it wasn't anchored down with any stickies, and it didn't have enough filling to keep the items in place. So when my mom opened it they were just all tossed around inside. Just a thought on the design, but the products are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: The foot cream is amazing! I put it on at night and put ...
customer_reviews.text: The foot cream is amazing! I put it on at night and put socks on, otherwise it might get messy. Feet are much softer the next morning. Nothing has helped this well before. I also rubbed this into my dry hands and cracked knuckles and the next morning they are no longer cracked! So glad I found something that works. Haven't tried the other items yet, but felt compelled to write about the foot cream.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great way to try before buying full sized
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin which gets worse this time of year (cold wonder weather). I had a small tin of the hand salve but I wanted to try other products before I started buying full sized. This was a great way to see what works best for my hands and when. For instance, I found that the lotion protects pretty well but does little to repair the already damaged skin. I loved all the products but it’s helping me to prioritize what to spend my money on first.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Momma

customer_reviews.title: Rancid Almond and Milk Hand Cream
customer_reviews.text: The Burt's Bees Almond and Milk hand cream arrived smelling rancid, like oil gone bad. The Honey and Grapeseed Hand Cream had separated and only liquid comes out of the tube. Obviously this boxed set is old, out of date and should not have been sold. I'm not happy Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing safety seals
customer_reviews.text: The one star is not for the product itself. I have used this product in the past and would continue to, however, this seller/product was missing safety seals. When I first opened the shipping box, I smelled a strong odor. (The item itself was in a tin box which had no plastic wrap, tape, or seal on the tin.) I checked to see if anything was leaking inside the tin. That's when I noticed the safety seals were missing off of 2 items. These items go on your lips so this is a safety concern. It was obvious the round lip balms had been tampered with so I am sending this item back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burt's Bees keeps the buzz alive. Great Item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for Christmas. The item arrived in great condition. The items are packaged in a nice yellow tin with paper filling. The product items are exactly as the photo shows. If you have purchased Burt's Bees in the past, expect the same quality product. Very happy with this item and Burt's Bees products.
customer_reviews.author: J.Marzetti

customer_reviews.title: Best hand-cream  I’ve ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved every product! I ordered one for my daughter, and another for my Mom for Mother’s Day! Such a good price, wow! Oh course I had to get another for myself. Seems like every time I give an amazing review, the price rolls up, so get it while you can. Literally the best handcream I’ve ever tried! The size is our little, but you don’t need much. Feels wonderful- definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT BURN!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait a couple weeks to see if this has improved my severely dry and cracking skin to leave a review but... Many products can moisturize and even heal but if you're like me you don't stick with them because your hands are so cracked around the knuckles (especially) that it burns immensely. It's just unbearable. If this is like the 10th product you're looking at hoping it won't burn and irritate you.... THIS WON'T! It is very moisturizing, I have a feeling I'll be updating with more positives to add but for now it's important to know this won't burn if you have cracked knuckles. I can't wait to use the gloves tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ertle

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "goodbye & thanks" gift to our former daycare provider. Love Burts Bees products and so does she! I figured this would be a nice way for her to give her lips, feet, & hands a little bit of love after washing her hands ten billion times a day and working hard to keep the tiny humans alive. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!! I bravely got to use each item before my 20 year old Daughter stole them from me as after trying the foot lotion, she fell in love with it too! These are perfect size for travel or keeping in your handbag. I really like the cuticle lotion as normally I use an oil which is very messy & this is so much better. Highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: MaryLaure Pallanti

customer_reviews.title: This set is wonderful!! The foot balm is so fabulous-put it ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is wonderful!! The foot balm is so fabulous-put it on then grab some socks and go to bed. It works wonders. It’s an oily type salve - best way I can describe, but not sticky, it goes right in. Try this you’ll love it. The cuticle tin works wonders! I keep one on my purse to use if I’m waiting somewhere and one by my bedside. You will love what this does for your cuticles and how great they look. The other items in this set are equally wonderful. This makes a very thoughtful gift for someone and the price is super. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA DAVY

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry and cracked cuticles
customer_reviews.text: I have a baby at home so I am constantly washing my hands, which leads to dry and cracked cuticles. I decided to try Burt's Bees hand repair cream to help with this issue and it has really helped! I love how the set comes with gloves because I can lather up my hands with a very generous amount of hand cream, which smells amazing by the way, and then allow it to soak overnight. The gloves are also not irritating to wear because they are not thick. I do not notice them during the night. No more cracked cuticles for me!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this! The items are tiny and two ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! The items are tiny and two of the six samples that I received were half empty! When I requested to return item, I was going to be charged $5.99 return shipping for a $10 item. Not up to Amazon's usual standards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a part of our Christmas gift to our Nanny. God knows she has to wash her hands enough times in the day & I figured this would be a nice way to pamper herself and give her hands some well-deserved TLC. I haven't given it to her yet but I know she will love it! Presentation is nice, will just wrap in wrapping paper and it's good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have read the reviews on this instead of just seeing 4.5 stars with 12k reviews. These are off-brand products that have been labeled as Burts Bees, or at best they are store returns. Pay close attention to the picture, two are in French (I think) and they do not come in a giftable container- they were in a cardboard mailer inside of the Amazon mailer. 2 of the items were completely missing the safety seals, and 2 of the safety seals were partially missing. The tubes were only partially filled.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon0921

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift, I keep the hand crème in my purse at all times. It's nice and thick and doesn't have an overpowering smell. I also really like the foot crème. The little balms I could take or leave. The tin is very nice as well and can be used for other purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my best friends baby shower. She asked for all burts bees baby products, and since we are both obsessed I figured I would get her this little kit to vring to thr hospital when it was time. She was so grateful and it had pretty much everything she needed and was small enough to pack in her bag. If yoyre expecting full size products than lower your expectations. If youre looking for a travel kit than this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Fae

customer_reviews.title: Likely an Expired Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the products in this box I’m quite certain only the lemon cuticle cream hasn’t officially “turned” or gone bad. The other creams and moisturizers were very sticky, had almost a crust-like appearance when coming out of the tubes, smelt a little off and overall did not offer the benefits I was looking for. I unfortunately could not find an expiration date on this set but compared to other Burt’s Bees products I was not impressed and find the quality to be poor.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The product was extremely waxy and not easy to rub on the skin and the smell was really horrible. Once the product is finally rubbed into the skin, it leaves an oily residue on your hands that is very uncomfortable. The only good thing about this are the overnight gloves because at least you wont be touching anything while you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Missing the lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for traveling, I really love the deep cleansing cream, hand salve and the body lotion. I'm not too fond of the foot cream, imagine putting honey or syrup on your feet is what it feels like. I only gave 3 stars as I'm disappointed!! what I really was looking forward to, wasn't in the gift set as it's missing & that's the lip balm. Other than that Burt's Bees has really amazing products!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift pouch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as holiday gifts for my coworkers. They were all impressed by the packaging and the contents. I even purchased one for myself!! Pouch includes: *Almond and milk hand cream which is moisturizing yet not greasy. *Lemon butter cuticle cream *Shea Butter Hand Repair Cream and a pair of cotton gloves. I rub the hand repair cream into my hands after a shower and then put on the cotton gloves. It leaves my hands so soft...
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent. Dislike consistency and application
customer_reviews.text: The cuticle balm and the hand balm smell great. But they are too greasy. I can’t use them unless I am going to bed, I can’t use or touch anything after application since they don’t dry. They don’t sit right on the skin. I found the cotton gloves most useful, to do like a mask overnight. The hand cream is more like a balm and it’s not very convenient to get it out of the tub. I think that there are better and cheaper options for hand moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Mma

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love about burts?
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. The hand lotion and cuticle oil are my favorites. The foot lotion was ok, was a bit greasy and I didn't care for the texture. The hand salve and almond milk lotion are great to apply before bedtime. Took some getting used to to the hand lotion smell, but now I don't mind at all. I have since bought a larger version of the hand lotion to keep at the bedside for my hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and its a good moisturizer. Product box and case was broken. Since it was for me and not a Christmas gift it didn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Not a gift set like it said in the listing
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a gift set. All of the items came in an envelope loose. If you have sensitive skin, don’t buy it. My skin is itchy after putting on the hand cream. As for the cleanser, my face got so dry after cleaning with the cleanser. Maybe burts bees is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good products, not so good packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry and didn’t read the description or the reviews carefully enough. Because, sure enough, it was just travel size product thrown into a packaging envelope. Kind of like someone had gone through the travel size bins at a discount store to put it together. You certainly couldn’t just give it as a gift the way it was sent. That said the little bottles are full and the seals are tight. It arrived in a timely manner. I love Burts Bees products and the travel size are perfect for those week long trips that I anticipate being able to take again!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this brand and have used different products thought this was a good way to try other products in the line I bought this to try the products 2 of the 6 tubes did not have a seal The day cream and the cream cleanser concerned about trying Not interested in returning If this is normal please inform I really like this brand
customer_reviews.author: patti h

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I received the product but missing items. I paid for the product under the impression of receiving lip balm, hand salve, res-q ointment, foot creme, hand cream, cuticle cream. However, the package arrived with missing paid items. Was going to give this as a gift, thankfully I opened and checked it for quality first. Returning product.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just Travel Sizes, NOT A Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: It is good to note that this title does not indicate that it is a gift set, but rather a set of travel sized products. It comes loose in an envelope. A good deal for all of these products and it definitely could be used as a gift for someone, but you would have to arrange it yourself. Overall, good value, and good variety of Burt's Bees items!
customer_reviews.author: JGRCreates

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sampler pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sampler pack from Burt's Bees. You get what you expect. If you're familiar with Burt's products, then you know these lotions and balms are nice. I particularly got this pack as a gift for a friend who constantly needs lotion or lip balm. These will be small enough to tuck in her car or her pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: So I love Burt's Bees products. I was excited to order these as a gift for my mother in law. However, they came all separated, in a regular pull apart bag (like you buy from a post office). It was a brand new package and all the products were new as well, I just expected them to be in a gift box of some sort since they all came together. So now it will look like I bought travel sized individual products for her. It's okay, I love these products and so does my MIL, but just an FYI before buying these as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Mom loved this gift set for Mother’s Day as she is prone to having very rough and dry hands — especially with COVID - all the hand washing has increased the cracking in her palms. I bought this set hoping it would help soften and hydrate her skin. We love Burts Bees — so I knew I couldn’t go wrong with purchasing this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift set for self-care
customer_reviews.text: This gift set is a nice way to provide some self-care. The kit comes with a variety of products to try to keep the hands softer and to take care of the cuticles too. The set includes a pair of soft yellow gloves to help absorb the lotion into the skin for overnight repair. I like Burt's Bees because the products are natural and are of real ingredients. I would purchase products from this company again and also use their cosmetics for lip care.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love all things burts bees and when I saw this I knew it would make an awesome Christmas gift! It was super affordable to be getting all these items. Burts bees is my favorite chapstick, it seems to be the only one that actually heals chapped lips. The small containers are great for a purse, car, or diaper bag. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kester

customer_reviews.title: I’ve ordered this several times for gift and even myself!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ‘go to gift’ for my nursing friends and to add to a gift basket! Products are on point, good quality, great scents-not over powering-just right and soothing, gloves are cozy and machine washable and the little gift bag that it comes in is really nice! Great price for great quality products!
customer_reviews.author: zacknabi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sampling Burt's Bees products
customer_reviews.text: Great for a white elephant that has a $10 limit. I would never have tried these products if I didn't receive this as a gift and I'm really glad I got the chance to try it. Now I'm purchasing this for white elephant this year. The foot cream works wonders on the heels. It has a thick consistency and its a bit greasy so it may be hard to put on but it'll be worth it in the end for those baby soft heels. I just put socks on for 15 minutes while I wait for my skin to absorb it. The lotion and chapstick are also great to have for travel, in the office, or in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrrns

customer_reviews.title: my hands suffer terribly. I got this
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders on my skin. During the winters here in upstate New York, my hands suffer terribly. I got this, and applied it at night, and within just a couple days my hands had completely changed. No more cracking bleeding dry skin! And the gloves that come in the kit are soft and nice fitting, even for me as I have very small hands and can never find gloves that fit. Will keep buying for ever winter!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Gillingham

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to myself.
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on the cuticle cream. Lasts a long time and really works. I had forgotten how rich the hand balm is and the cotton gloves let you gave your own spa experience at home. It also came with a cute little travel tube of hand cream at a great price. Great gift, also.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Powell

customer_reviews.title: everyone loves bees..yeah!?
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these gift sets to use as prizes for baby shower games thinking that if they weren't chosen by game participants I would be happy to to keep them for myself and through in my overnight bag for travel. Win Win. They live in someone else bag, they were a big hit and went fast because everyone loves Burts Bees! The price was right and they shipped fast. I plan to buy a few more for stocking suffers next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination of products.
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the sample sizes in this gift set! Especially the cuticle cream and the almond and milk hand cream, the almond scent is so nostalgic. I also like to use coconut foot cream on my tattoos because it really helps moisturize them to make them look almost brand new.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hard to shop for woman
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a tin , shredded brown paper inside with the items in the paper - it's not as shown in the pic on Amazon but it's nice. Great gift for hard to shop for women . For hands and feet care , not too personal for someone you don't know too well and it's gluten free !
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product and the price is pretty good the only downside is They need to make large bottles and products so It can last longer before I need to buy it again, like this product I may have to reorder them very soon... other then that ITS A GOOD PRODUCT IT DOES THE JOB WITH MY HANDS AND FEET SOFT AND HEALTHY.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought my maid of honor a set and myself. I have tried all of the set . I do not l;ike the hand repair . the oder is horrible and it made my hands itch . the balm for the cuticles is very hydrating and smells yummy . the overnight hand cream is ok smells nice and does a decent job of hydrating . Hopefully my maid honor will benefit from this set.
customer_reviews.author: Tj Allen & Tammie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ok creams, too-small gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The lotions and balms seem ok, they don’t work any better or worse than any other creams. The cuticle balm smells a little funky but that could be the sesame oil they use. The lost stars are because the gloves are SMALL. The cotton has some stretch but if you have normal-large hands these will either not fit at all or will be uncomfortably tight.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy F

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews if you subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.text: My initial purchase (subscribed) contained the products advertised. My second order had double the cleanser and no jar of almond with beeswax and milk, the best product out there for dry hands. The lotion smells funky but definitely works as does the delicious smelling foot cream. You might want to check other reviews to see if they’ve been missing products as well. Btw, These items arrive loose in an envelope. Not in the typical Burt’s set container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a gift set that doesn't come in a gift box
customer_reviews.text: I could have sworn the original photo showed a gift box, but now it does not. Received 6 sample sized lotions loose in a mailer. Probably my own fault, but now I need to find something to put them in so it looks like a gift not a last minute throw-together. No spills or leaks, just unhappy with my choice. I just saw thd same bundle in a box at Walmart for a dollar more. Totally worth the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything in this kit is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I was a great fan of Burt's lip balm for years; then I discovered this kit. I LOVE the hand and cuticle salves, which have a lovely smell and which I keep in my handbag for convenient moisturizing. The foot cream is a nice way to finish a pedicure. The honey hand cream is delightful. The almond cream is also very nice (and portable). The pomegranate lip balm gives a nice suggestion of colour and feels lovely on. Every single item is a winner. A bargain at the price, in my view. Also makes a really pleasant gift. Here I go again, buying another one.....
customer_reviews.author: transponder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mother’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to give as Mother’s Day gifts and couldn’t be happier with them! The products are full size and the large tin is such a nice way to package them! I would definitely get this again as a gift (or maybe even for myself!)
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt loved this and it is the perfect gift for that someone that has everything. It is a personal gift with that extra special combination of everything needed to take care of the skin. I also ordered this for my best friend's birthday and my sister's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: The almond lotion smells heavenly. I’ve been using this for the past 3 nights and see a noticeable improvement in the condition of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.text: The is my second one, first one was a gift. I’m hooked! I used each product every night and it quickly made a big difference. It really works. Every product has a light scent. The rescue cream is fantastic. All products feel great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice products and a gift tin
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after seeing all the negative reviews about products just thrown in an envelope, open containers etc but mine arrived all intact and in a nice tin. Since this is a Yankee swap gift it’s perfect. Don’t know where these other people got theirs from but the one I received is really good.
customer_reviews.author: SamBones

customer_reviews.title: Good set, weird packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a good set, but they came just loosely stuck in a box and not in any sort of Burt's Bees packaging, which was odd and annoying as I intended this as a gift. Not a deal breaker (again, great price and I got it during Black Friday or Cyber Monday or something) and I just put it in a cute gift bag, and the set doesn't say it comes in packaging, and yes that's better for the environment...but it was odd. So if you're buying this as a gift, get a gift bag ready I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite products ready to gift! Not to mention, the affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Burt’s Bees for years on end. There is *nothing* that works as well as their products have for me. No irritation. Keeps my hands, nails and cuticles so healthy looking and feeling. I love the bag it comes in. Perfect for secret Santa or a birthday gift! Even to pamper yourself!!!
customer_reviews.author: MandyK

customer_reviews.title: makes a good gift.
customer_reviews.text: This would make a good gift. I have used the products in this kit. The lemon nail and cuticle cream works well as far as moisturizing dry, chipped nails and dry cuticles. The almond milk hand cream is okay. You would need to use it on a regular daily basis, I think, to get best results. The shea butter hand repair cream has a creamy consistency---very nice. If you have a flax allergy/ linseed allergy avoid the shea butter hand repair cream. Even though it isn't listed as an ingredient, I still broke out in big welts. Flax and linseed are the only things that make me break out in big welts.
customer_reviews.author: MsKahuna

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Good stuff but missing contents
customer_reviews.text: Like others said - missing product in box. Requesting res-q cream/balm be sent! Think it’s a ripoff that it happens with such frequency
customer_reviews.author: silvertiger

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised how small everything was, but it's cute. Nice packaging. Everything looks nice. Got it as a gift for my sister. Hopefully she'll enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Artleigh Draws

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and was really pleased with slightly shimmery mesh bag/packaging. The perfect size for a quick "thinking of you" gift, teacher appreciation gift, etc. and the scents are simple and would probably appeal to lots of different people. I decided this didn't need a gift bag because it already looked very pretty as-is.
customer_reviews.author: IowaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great value and variety of products. Perfect gift or for personal usage. You get to sample a variety of products without having to purchase the larger sizes at full price and getting stuck with something you don't like. I was able to try the facial deep cleansing cream, lip balm, hand salve, body lotion and foot cream. Highly recommend this gift set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Scent
customer_reviews.text: One of these lotions has the WORST scent. It is so stinky, I can't even stand to use it. I was completely baffled and shocked to have such a horrible smelling product from Burt's Bees. It's the Shea Butter Hand Repair Cream with Cocoa Butter and Sesame Oil. It's horrific.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this gift set for the hands. It came with cuticle cream that smells and works great, 1 jar and 1 tube of hand cream that smell awesome and the gloves. They worked awesome at making my hands soft. They usually crack during the winter time and this will help them not to.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Burt's Bees Men's Travel Set
customer_reviews.text: Great travel size products.....love Burt's bees products and these are just the right size for my travel bag
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Mostly nice but VERY fragrant
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hand cream with almond oil, but the scent is really strong. It’s a nice smell, but it’s a lot. It seems to be very deeply moisturizing & feels luxurious when I put it on. The repair cream smells too strongly of rosemary— it’s almost unbearable. The gloves run small. My hands are thin, but with long fingers ( I’m 5’9) and I could barely get them on. They don’t really stretch. I have not tried the cuticle cream yet.
customer_reviews.author: Julia R.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely assortment of great priced products
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter’s stocking stuffers she wanted the lip balm and I wanted the rest of the product in there the lotion smells really good it’s moisturizing I like burt’s bee Products they are very easy to carry in your purse
customer_reviews.author: Erica Torres

customer_reviews.title: Kissable lips, soft hands and luxurious skin
customer_reviews.text: I love burts bees everything! The foot cream is amazing! I received a notification Saturday the gift set was on sale and had to have it! If you want kissable lips soft hands and feet this is definitely for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke McKibbin

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Love this Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for business trip, but I have to say I was happier with the travel size products I found at CVS. Burt's Bees moisturizers/cleansers don't feel or smell that great to me. I'm more likely to throw these out than use them again. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luma

customer_reviews.title: Does not moisturize well on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I saw my friend post that this lotion is super good for her hand. I purchased to try it. But. Actually not work for me. Compare to the organic coconut oil I use often. This one too dry for me. Smell is not good. I have sensitive skin. Coconut oil is better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: I have the worst cracked fingers
customer_reviews.text: I received the set yesterday. I used it before bed. Becareful if you have allergies to citrus. The cuticle lemon butter bothered my eyes and felt that it had to strong of a smell for bed. Besides the above comment. I will say that this is the best cuticle butter and hand creams so far. I've been using it constantly today and my hands feel and look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great addition to a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite items to gift teenage girls. The one thing I have to keep in mind is that these items are not in a gift/display box nor do they come in a reusable bag. Last year I was able to find inexpensive monogrammed makeup bags that worked well and it make this feel like a complete gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cute tin box it comes in! It's a gift for my mom for Mother's day! I love that she's getting a little variety with this set. I did expect the little salves etc. to be a bit bigger but I know Burt's Bees is a little more on the pricier end so that was to be expected. Overall I like the set itself and I can't wait for my mom to try some of these out. Shipping was pretty fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Came in a nice reusable plastic makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice reusable plastic makeup bag. All the items are full size. Nice presentation. Easily could give each item as a small gift or in a goodie "bag" with other items. Burt's Bees always good quality!
customer_reviews.author: dkjk2

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost gift
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy these add on items as gifts to keep around...there are always unplanned times I want to give someone a gift...and when I do there is no rush...no waiting. I already have it and at a discounted price...Win Win!!! I give high quality gifts that everyone thinks I spent a fortune on...but really it just pre-planning.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and fast!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! my hands were so dry and gross before this i didnt know what to do they were cracking and bleeding in some areas.. i started putting this one every night before bed and would wear the gloves till morning. I instantly started seeing a difference after the first day! In just a few weeks my hands are completely normal!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a co-worker for her birthday and have received rave reviews from her! We're on our feet all day long, and she always says she's going home to soak her feet, so I gave this a try. She says she'll definitely be buying more when she runs out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Millwood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: This gift set contains a great amount and selection of products and has a soft, nearly neutral but slight scent that appeals to men and women. The products leave the user with soft skin, lips, etc., and a feeling of having been massages!
customer_reviews.author: Irish ☘️ Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing. Throwing a paper route for over 7 years take a toll on your skin. Using this product as directed has seriously improved my hands! It smells great and really improves damage as well as protects your hands from the rough weather. I highly recommend you try this!
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaJB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soothing dry hands
customer_reviews.text: I got this set because my hands were getting so dry due to excessive washing because of the coronavirus, and every item in this box has helped to heal my skin so well. I enjoyed the foot cream so much that I decided to buy a full sized bottle for me and my mom. If you're looking for a good sample or travel pack, this one it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marylou

customer_reviews.title: Good stocking stuffer gift set
customer_reviews.text: Was a good stocking stuffer for my mom. She liked everything except for the scent for the body lotion. She said it gave her a headache. I tried it and it did bother my head a bit, also. She liked everything else though.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail for medical staff 🙌
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the medical field and due excessive hand washing now and days my hands were so dry you can literally see my skin peeling and red and cracked, THIS HAS SAVED MY HANDS IT WORKS SO WELL. I will be buying this product again the scent isn’t horrible just not a fan of lemon and almond but it’s not that strong to linger on your hands. Great gift also for your coworkers
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughter for Christmas. She seemed to really like it. The shipping was fast, the price couldn't be beat, description of product was always dead on, and I would recommend to anyone looking for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mothers birthday. Our family has used Burts Bees products for 20+ years. I remember when she would give me the tin of Burts Bees with the lime on the label when I was a child and would accidentally burn myself on pretty much anything that could inflict burns. It really did work well for those kinds of things. Everything that comes with this kit is excelent... Except for the coconut cream. I hate coconuts. Everything else is really really good, natural, and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Gift for wife. She did not like ar all. Not easy to apply and did not like smell. Says she would not want anymore. Well, I wasted money on that gift.
customer_reviews.author: Invisible

customer_reviews.title: Love Burts bees
customer_reviews.text: This was the best Christmas gift I gave out to so many people, you know the ones that are hard to buy for.... I bought extras just in case I forgot anybody.. And most definitely kept one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: tarra

customer_reviews.title: Great package to get for traveling or to have in purse
customer_reviews.text: Nice package. It had everything you need when you are traveling to place in your make up bag. Every was new and sealed. Arrived on time smells great. Moisturize work great not over powering smell and has hands soft.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLY

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING set!
customer_reviews.text: Every item in this little set is superb. Each product has its own distinct and wonderful set. My hands have never felt so smooth. This is one of my new must have products. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love thus! I actually bought it bc I thought it had some eye cream and it didn’t when I got it. I made a mistake but I’m glad I bought it bc it has helped my face and feet. I rarely use a moisturizer on my face but this stuff didnt make my face feel greasy all day.
customer_reviews.author: Courtneyjo322

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees Hand Repair Gift Set, 3 Hand Creams plus Gloves Almond Milk Hand Cream, Lemon Butter Cuticle Cream, Shea Butter Hand Repair
product_meta.description: Get the spa treatment at home with Burts Bees Hand Repair Gift Set which includes 3 favorites that pamper dry hands. Lemon Butter Cuticle Cream softens cuticles and nourishes nails, Almond and Milk Hand Cream hydrates skin, and Shea Butter Hand Repair Cream hydrates dry hands with luxurious botanical butters. Plus, a pair of cotton gloves is included to hold in these moisture rich products. This Burts Bees gift set is the perfect birthday or holiday present for anyone on your list. Sweet packaging is designed to be gift ready so you can skip the wrapping. Give the gift of nourishment with Burts Bees skin care.
feature_bullets: HAND CREAM: These two ultra-rich, naturally moisturizing Burt's Bees Hand Creams repair tough, dried out skin from the harsh winter months.
CUTICLE CREAM: Burt's Bees Cuticle Cream revitalizes torn, rough cuticles to moisturize and sooth hangnails for soft, smooth hands.
ALL NATURAL: Made with natural ingredients, these Burt's Bees hand products are formulated with sweet almond oil, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera and botanical oils.

BURTS BEES GIFT SET: This gift set includes 3 moisturizing hand products and one pair of cotton gloves in a giftable organza pouch perfect for stocking stuffers during the holidays or for the beauty enthusiast.
GIFTS FOR HER: Pamper someone you love with this giftable hand spa kit including Almond Milk Hand Cream, Shea Butter Hand Repair Cream and Lemon Butter Cuticle Cream, plus 1 pair of cotton gloves.
